long_description: The Marmot Earlylight 2P tent features a strong pole structure with an easy setup and 2 doors with 2 roomy vestibules; includes both a gear loft and footprint for extra value and convenience. With 2 doors and 2 vestibules, there's plenty of room to store your gear, and you don't have to crawl over your tentmate to get in and out. Color-coded poles and clips simplify and speed tent setup. DAC Featherlite(R) poles offer a high strength-to-weight ratio; pole clips with 2 connection points make easy work of setting up the Marmot Earlylight tent. Catenary-cut floor provides a tight pitch; taped seams are lifted off the ground to ensure waterproof protection. UV-resistant, fully seam sealed polyester rainfly resists stretching when wet, ensuring a consistently taut pitch. Waterproof and UV-resistant window in fly lets light in and lets you check the weather outside. Snag-free zipper flap and jingle-free zipper pulls enhance livability. As a convenient option, poles and rainfly can be set up with the footprint to create a lightweight shelter.
